attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As an existing member of the territorial army.
And someone who has been disgusted by this governments lack of funds for the armed forces.
I was wondering why there are millions on benifits and not putting anything into the system.
Housing benifit,social security,council tax benifit,disability living allowance,mental health benifits,single parent benifit,alchahol dependant benifits,bridging loans,social fund loans,and all other government loans.we require the government make them take any job in the job centre.or work for there benifits.tax them train them save millions put the territorial army back in training as they spill blood for this country and give the british forces the money saved which would be millions.Also stop the private hostels and put them back in government hands as the money paid to these private companys is disgustingly high hence £300 per week per resident plus other expenses.
no wonder the country is in recession,millions could be saved by making the system tighter.
